attributes.value: Finds the following of tradition foolish and limiting
Sees freedom and independence as completely worthless
Respects the development of skill
Sees sacrifice as wasteful and foolish
Often feels discouraged
Rarely looks on others with lust
Desires little for herself in the way of possessions
Occasionally overindulges
Doesn't stick with things if even minor difficulties arise
Has great trouble mastering fear when confronted by danger
Is not driven and rarely feels the need to pursue even a modest success
Presents herself modestly and frowns on any flashy accoutrements
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is intellectually stubborn, rarely changing her mind during a debate regardless of the merits
Tries to keep her things orderly
Slow to heal
Meager creativity
A sum of patience
A little difficulty with words
A feel for music
A very good sense of the position of her own body
